text: The Gadek Hot Spring () is a hot spring in Alor Gajah, Melaka, Malaysia. ==History== The area around the hot spring was firstly developed in the 1980s and has been improved over time as a popular tourist attraction. ==Geology== The hot spring has a surface temperature of 56 °C with an average water flow of 5.4 litres per minute, containing hydrogen sulphite gas. ==Facilities== The hot spring is equipped with restaurant, food stalls, children's playground, outdoor swimming pool and bathrooms. ==Opening time== The hot spring opens everyday from 7.00 a.m. to 9.00 p.m. ==See also== * Geography of Malaysia ==References== Category:Hot springs of Malaysia Category:Malacca
title: Gadek Hot Spring
